title: 基于深度学习的图像识别研究
title_en: Research on Image Recognition Based on Deep Learning
college: 计算机科学与工程学院
abstract_zh: 本文提出了一种改进的卷积神经网络模型，用于解决复杂背景下的图像识别问题。实验结果表明，该模型在CIFAR-10数据集上的准确率达到了95%以上，显著优于传统方法。
keywords_zh: 深度学习；图像识别；卷积神经网络
abstract_en: This paper proposes an improved Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) model to solve the problem of image recognition in complex backgrounds. The experimental results show that the accuracy of the model on the CIFAR-10 dataset reaches more than 95%, which is significantly better than traditional methods.
